channel.title: Help with new items
channel.description: ok, so i changed my client.java to let me get new items, k? well why do if i use "::pickup" does it crash me and if i use "::item" and pick it up, it becomes a noted tzhaar-ket-em?

item.title: Help with new items
item.dc:creator: @Xenox Xenox
item.description:
@Xenox wrote:

i’m using moparscape v2.1, do i need a newer one?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new items
item.dc:creator: @Trigun Trigun
item.description:
@Trigun wrote:

You need to find in your client about when you pickup items greater than I believe 6540 it turns it into item 6540; all you do is change the “> 6540” to “> 7500”. Also, you need to mod your item.cfg for each new item you add… You also need a new client with the cache of all the new items.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with new items
